columns.title: Purpose
columns.description: The degree to which there is alignment about a meaningful change that leadership and employees want to make in the world.

columns.title: Looking Out
columns.description: The degree to which employees get insights and inspiration from beyond the companyâ€™s walls.

columns.title: Experimentation
columns.description: The degree to which a company is able to explore new ideas quickly and inexpensively, and evolve them towards a successful solution.

columns.title: Collaboration
columns.description: The degree to which employees of different roles and within different departments work together to bring new ideas forward.

columns.title: Empowerment
columns.description: The degree to which the organization provides a clear path for employees to create change.

columns.title: Refinement
columns.description: The degree to which the strategy, product, and design functions within a company play nicely with the execution roles as new ideas move towards implementation.
